column1: Kata Robata////I am so impressed by the professionalism of the owner of this place. My last review was rather cranky. I mean
column2: I think it's really important for restaurants to move towards foregrounding excellent non-meat dishes
column3: even if that's not their primary "thing"
column4: but I have to admit that sometimes the frustration does sort of all come out at once. Anyway
column5: Ryan wrote to me and offered to make my last meal up to me by showing me how well Kata can do veg. food. I don't know how he manages to deal with criticism in such a generous and zen way
column6: but I'm a fan of his now!
